params.headline: Unit economics update
params.key_message: loss ratio trends and disciplined growth across geos

cases.result: Lemonade, Inc. (NYSE: LMND) today reported its unit economics update, highlighting disciplined growth across geos and trends in loss ratio. The company's second-quarter results demonstrate accelerating growth in its car product and European markets, accompanied by ongoing expense discipline.
Confirm Details

params.title: phishing drills
params.key_update: phishing simulation next week; report suspicious emails

cases.result: Next week, we'll be conducting a phishing simulation to help us stay vigilant against suspicious emails. Please report any suspicious emails you receive during the simulation to help us identify potential threats.
Agree

params.headline: Pet Wellness expands in EU
params.key_message: simpler care and instant everything for your furry family

cases.result: Lemonade, the digital insurer, is expanding its pet wellness services in the European Union, making it easier for pet owners to provide simpler care for their furry family members. With instant everything, pet owners can now verify, confirm, and resend claims in a matter of seconds, giving them peace of mind when it matters most. This expansion is part of Lemonade's commitment to providing transparent pricing and community-driven Giveback, donating unused premiums to nonprofits chosen by customers.

params.title: company event
params.key_update: all-hands offsite confirmed for next month, details soon

cases.result:
Company Event

We're excited to confirm that our all-hands offsite event is scheduled for next month! Details will follow soon, but for now, save the date and get ready for a fun and productive gathering.
We're performing analytics warehouse maintenance on Friday from 22:00-23:00 UTC. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the accuracy of our analytics data.

params.headline: Q2 2025 results posted
params.key_message: growth, underwriting health, and continued operating efficiency

cases.result: NEW YORK — August 5, 2025 — Lemonade, Inc. (NYSE: LMND) today reported its second-quarter 2025 results, showcasing continued growth, underwriting health, and operating efficiency improvements. The company's disciplined approach to underwriting and expense management enabled it to maintain a strong financial position, while its car product and European markets demonstrated accelerating growth.

params.title: holiday coverage
params.key_update: reduced coverage on national holiday; escalation as usual

cases.result:
Holiday Coverage

We wanted to remind you that our holiday coverage will be reduced on the upcoming national holiday. In the event of an issue, escalation will occur as usual, so you can continue to rely on our support.

Best,

params.headline: Lemonade reports strong Q2 growth
params.key_message: accelerating growth with healthy underwriting and expense discipline

cases.result: Lemonade, Inc. (NYSE: LMND) today reported strong second-quarter growth, driven by accelerating growth with healthy underwriting and expense discipline. The company's continued focus on operating efficiency improvements enabled it to maintain a strong financial position, positioning it for future growth.
Resend Code

params.headline: Faster claim decisions
params.key_message: more customers get paid in minutes with zero paperwork

cases.result: Lemonade is revolutionizing the way customers receive compensation for claims, now paying out more customers in minutes with zero paperwork required. This significant improvement in processing speed and efficiency is a direct result of our commitment to automation and instant everything, allowing us to provide faster and more transparent claims decisions. With our digital insurer model built on AI and social impact, we're dedicated to giving back to our community through our annual Giveback program, donating unused premiums to nonprofits chosen by our customers.
Pay Now

cases.result: We've moved our product roadmap sync to Tuesdays at 11:00. From now on, you can expect to receive updates on the latest developments every Tuesday morning.

params.headline: Lemonade renews reinsurance program
params.key_message: supports growth while reducing earnings volatility

cases.result: Lemonade renews reinsurance program to support growth while reducing earnings volatility. The digital insurer has renewed its reinsurance program, ensuring continued stability and flexibility as it expands its offerings and enters new markets. This strategic move enables Lemonade to maintain its focus on disciplined underwriting and operating efficiency, while also mitigating the impact of unpredictable market fluctuations on its earnings.
